title: Ask HN: The government of my country blocked VPN access. What should I use?
author: rickybule
aiHeadline: Ask HN: My country's government decided to block VPNs because they're clearly the root of all evil. What should I use instead? Maybe a pigeon with a USB drive?

title: Are OpenAI and Anthropic losing money on inference?
author: martinald
aiHeadline: Are OpenAI and Anthropic losing money on inference? Probably, but at least they're not losing it on trying to figure out why people keep asking if they're losing money.

title: Open Source is one person
author: LawnGnome
aiHeadline: Open Source is one person: Because apparently, the rest of the world is too busy scrolling through TikTok to help maintain critical infrastructure.

title: The Deletion of Docker.io/Bitnami
author: zdkaster
aiHeadline: The Deletion of Docker.io/Bitnami: Docker is cleaning up its act by deleting all the messy, community-driven stuff. Now it's just a bunch of curated, corporate-approved nonsense.

title: Important machine learning equations
author: sebg
aiHeadline: Important machine learning equations: Because nothing says 'I'm a real data scientist' like memorizing a bunch of equations that no one actually understands.
